engChrName: There they are!
engSearchText: There they are!
jpnChrName: いました！
jpnSearchText: いました！

engChrName: That...doesn't look good.
engSearchText: That...doesn't look good.
jpnChrName: これは……！
jpnSearchText: これは……！

engChrName: We should prooobably keep our distance.
engSearchText: We should prooobably keep our distance.
jpnChrName: 迂闊に近づかない方が良さそうね。
jpnSearchText: 迂闊に近づかない方が良さそうね。

engChrName: Wh-What in the blue blazes?
engSearchText: Wh-What in the blue blazes?
jpnChrName: お、お前たちは……！？
jpnSearchText: お、お前たちは……！？

engChrName: Hey there. How's it goin'?
engSearchText: Hey there. How's it goin'?
jpnChrName: よう、また会ったな。
jpnSearchText: よう、また会ったな。

engChrName: ...Rather poorly, as you can plainly see. Why don't you cease with the pointless questions and help us?!
engSearchText:
...Rather poorly, as you can plainly see. Why don't
you cease with the pointless questions and help us?!
jpnChrName: あの時の……！ いや、今それはどうでもいい！
jpnSearchText:
あの時の……！
いや、今それはどうでもいい！

engChrName: Will do. We are bein' paid to get you outta this jam, after all.
engSearchText:
Will do. We are bein' paid to get you outta this jam,
after all.
jpnChrName: そうだな、今回は依頼を受けて アンタらを探しに来たぜ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、今回は依頼を受けて
アンタらを探しに来たぜ。

engChrName: We're problem solvers, and we got a request to find you guys.
engSearchText:
We're problem solvers, and we got a request to find
you guys.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋だ、依頼を受けて アンタらを探しに来たぜ。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋だ、依頼を受けて
アンタらを探しに来たぜ。

engChrName: Th-Then hurry the hell up and do something about this!
engSearchText:
Th-Then hurry the hell up and do something
about this!
jpnChrName: だ、だったら早く何とかしろ！
jpnSearchText: だ、だったら早く何とかしろ！

engChrName: Would you mind explaining the situation first?
engSearchText: Would you mind explaining the situation first?
jpnChrName: まずは状況を教えていただけないでしょうか。
jpnSearchText: まずは状況を教えていただけないでしょうか。

engChrName: Are you blind, woman?! We're being held against our will—so just get us out of here, already!
engSearchText:
Are you blind, woman?! We're being held against our
will—so just get us out of here, already!
jpnChrName: 見りゃ分かんだろ！ 俺たちが拘束されてんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
見りゃ分かんだろ！
俺たちが拘束されてんだよ！

engChrName: B-But how can they?!
engSearchText: B-But how can they?!
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ！
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっと待ってくれ！

engChrName: We've got these restraints, and if we force them off, they'll blow up!
engSearchText:
We've got these restraints, and if we force them off,
they'll blow up!
jpnChrName: 強引に解除しようとしたら爆発するって 言われたじゃん！
jpnSearchText:
強引に解除しようとしたら爆発するって
言われたじゃん！

engChrName: Ngh!
engSearchText: Ngh!

engChrName: I recognize that machine.
engSearchText: I recognize that machine.
jpnChrName: 爆発、するとこれらの機械が……
jpnSearchText: 爆発、するとこれらの機械が……

engChrName: It looks just like the one we saw earlier today.
engSearchText: It looks just like the one we saw earlier today.
jpnChrName: これは──
jpnSearchText: これは──

engChrName: And those look like Melchior's bombs.
engSearchText: And those look like Melchior's bombs.
jpnChrName: フン、見覚えのある浮遊爆弾だな。
jpnSearchText: フン、見覚えのある浮遊爆弾だな。

engChrName: All right, start talkin'. If you want us to save you, then you're gonna need to fill us in on all the details.
engSearchText:
All right, start talkin'. If you want us to save you, then
you're gonna need to fill us in on all the details.
jpnChrName: とにかく詳しい話を聞かせてくれ。 助かりたいんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
とにかく詳しい話を聞かせてくれ。
助かりたいんだろ？

engChrName: V-Very well.
engSearchText: V-Very well.
jpnChrName: わ、分かってる！
jpnSearchText: わ、分かってる！

engChrName: Over the last few days, some people we've never seen before started coming in and out of these underground areas.
engSearchText:
Over the last few days, some people we've never seen
before started coming in and out of these
underground areas.
jpnChrName: 最近見知らぬ連中が、このオラシオンで こそこそ遺構に出入りしてるみたいでな。
jpnSearchText:
最近見知らぬ連中が、このオラシオンで
こそこそ遺構に出入りしてるみたいでな。

engChrName: And we weren't too hot on that.
engSearchText: And we weren't too hot on that.
jpnChrName: それが気に入らなかったんだよ。
jpnSearchText: それが気に入らなかったんだよ。

engChrName: We wanted to know what they were up to, so we snuck in here.
engSearchText:
We wanted to know what they were up to, so we
snuck in here.
jpnChrName: 何をしてるか気になって── 俺たちも今夜、遺構に潜ろうとしてたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
何をしてるか気になって──
俺たちも今夜、遺構に潜ろうとしてたんだ。

engChrName: And that's when we came face to face with that scrawny-lookin' psycho. Had some weird-ass mint hair.
engSearchText:
And that's when we came face to face with that
scrawny-lookin' psycho. Had some weird-ass
mint hair.
jpnChrName: で、この辺まで来たら、 いきなりミント髪のナヨメンが現れてよ。
jpnSearchText:
で、この辺まで来たら、
いきなりミント髪のナヨメンが現れてよ。

engChrName: He said something about wanting to drown us in our blood for trespassing—and then he attacked us!
engSearchText:
He said something about wanting to drown us in our
blood for trespassing—and then he attacked us!
jpnChrName: 勝手に入っちゃダメじゃないか、 とか言って襲い掛かってきやがったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
勝手に入っちゃダメじゃないか、
とか言って襲い掛かってきやがったんだ！

engChrName: We tried to gang up on him, but he just knocked us all out with one swipe.
engSearchText:
We tried to gang up on him, but he just knocked us
all out with one swipe.
jpnChrName: 返り討ちにしようと一斉にかかろうとしたら 一瞬で気絶させられちまった。
jpnSearchText:
返り討ちにしようと一斉にかかろうとしたら
一瞬で気絶させられちまった。

engChrName: When we came to, we were here.
engSearchText: When we came to, we were here.
jpnChrName: ……そして気が付いたらこのざまだ。
jpnSearchText: ……そして気が付いたらこのざまだ。

engChrName: Well, I think the culprit is fairly obvious.
engSearchText: Well, I think the culprit is fairly obvious.
jpnChrName: ミント髪のナヨメンって…… って、言わずもがなか。
jpnSearchText:
ミント髪のナヨメンって……
って、言わずもがなか。

engChrName: Yeah. This case has Melchior written all over it.
engSearchText: Yeah. This case has Melchior written all over it.
jpnChrName: はい、メルキオルで間違いありません！
jpnSearchText: はい、メルキオルで間違いありません！

engChrName: Hate to say it, but it...uh...kinda sounds like you brought this on yourselves.
engSearchText:
Hate to say it, but it...uh...kinda sounds like you
brought this on yourselves.
jpnChrName: なんていうか…… ちょっと自業自得な気もするわね。
jpnSearchText:
なんていうか……
ちょっと自業自得な気もするわね。

engChrName: Yeah. This whole room reeks of dumbassery.
engSearchText: Yeah. This whole room reeks of dumbassery.
jpnChrName: まあ、確かにな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、確かにな。

engChrName: Did you only come here to mock us?!
engSearchText: Did you only come here to mock us?!
jpnChrName: ──ごちゃごちゃ言ってないで 俺たちを助けろ！
jpnSearchText:
──ごちゃごちゃ言ってないで
俺たちを助けろ！

engChrName: I demand that you get rid of these blasted bombs, even if you have to throw yourselves on them to do it!
engSearchText:
I demand that you get rid of these blasted bombs,
even if you have to throw yourselves on them to do it!
jpnChrName: どうせ、おじい様から たっぷりミラをもらう予定なんだろう！
jpnSearchText:
どうせ、おじい様から
たっぷりミラをもらう予定なんだろう！

engChrName: I'm sure my grandfather is paying you a fortune and a half to save me!
engSearchText:
I'm sure my grandfather is paying you a fortune and a
half to save me!
jpnChrName: なんなら俺が上乗せしてやってもいい、 命懸けでこの爆弾を何とかしろ！
jpnSearchText:
なんなら俺が上乗せしてやってもいい、
命懸けでこの爆弾を何とかしろ！

engChrName: And I'll even add a little extra to sweeten the deal.
engSearchText: And I'll even add a little extra to sweeten the deal.
jpnChrName: お前たちのような庶民には一生かけても 稼げないくらいの額だ。
jpnSearchText:
お前たちのような庶民には一生かけても
稼げないくらいの額だ。

engChrName: I can easily pay double what you lowlife good-for- nothings will all make throughout your entire lives.
engSearchText:
I can easily pay double what you lowlife good-for-
nothings will all make throughout your entire lives.
jpnChrName: その安い命の一つや二つを引き換えにしても お釣りが出るくらいだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
その安い命の一つや二つを引き換えにしても
お釣りが出るくらいだぜ？

engChrName: A couple of bodies for a lifetime of comfort. That sounds like a pretty good trade to me.
engSearchText:
A couple of bodies for a lifetime of comfort.
That sounds like a pretty good trade to me.
jpnChrName: 俺たちさえ無事ならな！
jpnSearchText: 俺たちさえ無事ならな！

engChrName: You have some nerve.
engSearchText: You have some nerve.
jpnChrName: なんて言い草……
jpnSearchText: なんて言い草……

engChrName: Is it wrong that I want to help him even less now?
engSearchText: Is it wrong that I want to help him even less now?
jpnChrName: ちょっぴり、ムッと来ました。
jpnSearchText: ちょっぴり、ムッと来ました。

engChrName: Nope. I was just thinking the same thing.
engSearchText: Nope. I was just thinking the same thing.
jpnChrName: ハッ、分かりやすい野郎だ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、分かりやすい野郎だ。

engChrName: Yeah, we're out. Good luck gettin' outta this one on your own.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're out. Good luck gettin' outta this one on
your own.
jpnChrName: ──そうかそうか、じゃあ 俺たちはこのまま帰らせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
──そうかそうか、じゃあ
俺たちはこのまま帰らせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Huh? What do you mean?
engSearchText: Huh? What do you mean?
jpnChrName: は？　なにを言って……
jpnSearchText: は？　なにを言って……

engChrName: I mean, you said it yourself. We're just some lowlife good-for-nothings.
engSearchText:
I mean, you said it yourself. We're just some lowlife
good-for-nothings.
jpnChrName: だってそうだろ？　俺らはしがない庶民だ。
jpnSearchText: だってそうだろ？　俺らはしがない庶民だ。

engChrName: A bunch of dignified upper class gentlemen shouldn't be takin' help from the likes of us.
engSearchText:
A bunch of dignified upper class gentlemen shouldn't
be takin' help from the likes of us.
jpnChrName: さぞや高貴なアンタたちと 関わること自体がおこがましいってモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
さぞや高貴なアンタたちと
関わること自体がおこがましいってモンだ。

engChrName: Should've realized you had this under control, so we'll just see ourselves out. Peace.
engSearchText:
Should've realized you had this under control, so we'll
just see ourselves out. Peace.
jpnChrName: ってなわけで撤収すんぞ。
jpnSearchText: ってなわけで撤収すんぞ。

engChrName: H-Hey!
engSearchText: H-Hey!
jpnChrName: お、おいッ――！
jpnSearchText: お、おいッ――！

engChrName: Don't go!
engSearchText: Don't go!
jpnChrName: 本当に帰るつもりかよ！？
jpnSearchText: 本当に帰るつもりかよ！？

engChrName: Say something, damn it! We can't get outta this ourselves!
engSearchText:
Say something, damn it! We can't get outta
this ourselves!
jpnChrName: ど、どうすんだよ！？
jpnSearchText: ど、どうすんだよ！？

engChrName: Wait! Please!
engSearchText: Wait! Please!
jpnChrName: 待て！　待ってくれ！
jpnSearchText: 待て！　待ってくれ！

engChrName: Are you seriously leaving me here to die?! I'm the grandson of the ETWS president!
engSearchText:
Are you seriously leaving me here to die?! I'm the
grandson of the ETWS president!
jpnChrName: バカな……！　俺を見捨てるつもりか！ エトワス社社長の孫であるこの俺を！
jpnSearchText:
バカな……！　俺を見捨てるつもりか！
エトワス社社長の孫であるこの俺を！

engChrName: That's no way to ask someone for help, my guy.
engSearchText: That's no way to ask someone for help, my guy.
jpnChrName: はあ…… それが人に助けを求める態度か？
jpnSearchText:
はあ……
それが人に助けを求める態度か？

engChrName: Try again. This is your last chance.
engSearchText: Try again. This is your last chance.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが── 次がラストチャンスだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが──
次がラストチャンスだぜ？

engChrName: Guh...
engSearchText: Guh...

engChrName: I-I... I'm...sorry...
engSearchText: I-I... I'm...sorry...
jpnChrName: お、俺が………… ……悪かったから…………
jpnSearchText:
お、俺が…………
……悪かったから…………

engChrName: Please! Save us!
engSearchText: Please! Save us!
jpnChrName: 頼む、助けてくれ！
jpnSearchText: 頼む、助けてくれ！

engChrName: I don't wanna die here!
engSearchText: I don't wanna die here!
jpnChrName: まだ死にたくないんだ、頼む！！
jpnSearchText: まだ死にたくないんだ、頼む！！

engChrName: ...Good enough.
engSearchText: ...Good enough.
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ。 ま、最低限の誠意は伝わってきたか。
jpnSearchText:
……やれやれ。
ま、最低限の誠意は伝わってきたか。

engChrName: Phew.
engSearchText: Phew.
jpnChrName: ほっ……
jpnSearchText: ほっ……

engChrName: Thank goodness.
engSearchText: Thank goodness.
jpnChrName: 良かったぁ……
jpnSearchText: 良かったぁ……

engChrName: For a second, I thought you were actually gonna bail on us.
engSearchText:
For a second, I thought you were actually gonna bail
on us.
jpnChrName: 本当に見捨てられるかと思ったぜ……
jpnSearchText: 本当に見捨てられるかと思ったぜ……

engChrName: So do you know for sure that those things are bombs?
engSearchText: So do you know for sure that those things are bombs?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、アンタたちはどうして こいつが爆弾だって分かってんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、アンタたちはどうして
こいつが爆弾だって分かってんだ？

engChrName: Yeah. That lunatic set one off right in front of us.
engSearchText: Yeah. That lunatic set one off right in front of us.
jpnChrName: それは……あのミント野郎が同じものを 俺たちの見てる前で爆発させたからな。
jpnSearchText:
それは……あのミント野郎が同じものを
俺たちの見てる前で爆発させたからな。

engChrName: Just thinking about that is giving me goosebumps all over again...
engSearchText:
Just thinking about that is giving me goosebumps all
over again...
jpnChrName: 思い出してもゾッとする…… あんなのに巻き込まれたら粉微塵だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
思い出してもゾッとする……
あんなのに巻き込まれたら粉微塵だぜ。

engChrName: Did he say anything about how to disarm them?
engSearchText: Did he say anything about how to disarm them?
jpnChrName: それらの解除方法について 何か言っていませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
それらの解除方法について
何か言っていませんでしたか？

engChrName: I kinda doubt he'd tell them that.
engSearchText: I kinda doubt he'd tell them that.
jpnChrName: わざわざそんなことを言うでしょうか？
jpnSearchText: わざわざそんなことを言うでしょうか？

engChrName: Actually, I wouldn't put it past him. He does love his theatrics, after all.
engSearchText:
Actually, I wouldn't put it past him. He does love his
theatrics, after all.
jpnChrName: ま、こいつらを消したいだけなら ここまで回りくどいことをする必要もねぇしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、こいつらを消したいだけなら
ここまで回りくどいことをする必要もねぇしな。

engChrName: I could see him giving them a clue or two for us to decipher.
engSearchText:
I could see him giving them a clue or two for us
to decipher.
jpnChrName: 言っていたとしてもおかしくはねえだろ。 ──で、どうなんだ？
jpnSearchText:
言っていたとしてもおかしくはねえだろ。
──で、どうなんだ？

engChrName: Y-Yes, that's exactly what he did.
engSearchText: Y-Yes, that's exactly what he did.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……確かに言ったぜ……
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ……確かに言ったぜ……

engChrName: We can disarm the bombs with a password.
engSearchText: We can disarm the bombs with a password.
jpnChrName: パスワードで解除できるって……
jpnSearchText: パスワードで解除できるって……

engChrName: So how do we figure that out?
engSearchText: So how do we figure that out?
jpnChrName: パスワードねぇ、何かヒントは？
jpnSearchText: パスワードねぇ、何かヒントは？

engChrName: You have to solve an Oración quiz.
engSearchText: You have to solve an Oración quiz.
jpnChrName: オラシオンクイズ……
jpnSearchText: オラシオンクイズ……

engChrName: A what now?
engSearchText: A what now?
jpnChrName: は？
jpnSearchText: は？

engChrName: I said an Oración quiz! Don't make me repeat myself!
engSearchText: I said an Oración quiz! Don't make me repeat myself!
jpnChrName: だからオラシオンクイズだって！
jpnSearchText: だからオラシオンクイズだって！

engChrName: That rat bastard made us memorize the questions. He said the answers would help you find the password.
engSearchText:
That rat bastard made us memorize the questions.
He said the answers would help you find
the password.
jpnChrName: あの野郎、そのクイズの答えが パスワードのヒントって言ったんだ！
jpnSearchText:
あの野郎、そのクイズの答えが
パスワードのヒントって言ったんだ！

engChrName: That guy loves screwing with us, doesn't he?
engSearchText: That guy loves screwing with us, doesn't he?
jpnChrName: クク、とことんふざけた野郎だぜ。
jpnSearchText: クク、とことんふざけた野郎だぜ。

engChrName: Why am I not surprised?
engSearchText: Why am I not surprised?
jpnChrName: ま、らしいっちゃらしいがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、らしいっちゃらしいがな。

engChrName: So what're the questions? For your sake, I really hope you didn't forget 'em.
engSearchText:
So what're the questions? For your sake, I really hope
you didn't forget 'em.
jpnChrName: そのクイズの内容は？ まさか忘れたとは言わねえよな？
jpnSearchText:
そのクイズの内容は？
まさか忘れたとは言わねえよな？

engChrName: Of course not. There were four in total, so each of us committed one to memory!
engSearchText:
Of course not. There were four in total, so each of us
committed one to memory!
jpnChrName: もちろんだ！　全部で４問あったが それぞれで分担して覚えたからな！
jpnSearchText:
もちろんだ！　全部で４問あったが
それぞれで分担して覚えたからな！

engChrName: Why did you have to do it that way? Couldn't you just remember them all?
engSearchText:
Why did you have to do it that way? Couldn't you
just remember them all?
jpnChrName: いやいや、そこは みんな４問とも覚えなよ……
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、そこは
みんな４問とも覚えなよ……

engChrName: That is likely beyond their capabilities. We shouldn't expect so much of them.
engSearchText:
That is likely beyond their capabilities. We shouldn't
expect so much of them.
jpnChrName: この方たちに過度な期待は酷かと。
jpnSearchText: この方たちに過度な期待は酷かと。

engChrName: Shut the hell up! Thanks to all your rambling, I went and forgot it!
engSearchText:
Shut the hell up! Thanks to all your rambling, I went
and forgot it!
jpnChrName: うるせぇな！　テメーらが騒いだせいで ちょっと忘れちまったじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
うるせぇな！　テメーらが騒いだせいで
ちょっと忘れちまったじゃねえか！

engChrName: What the hell, Damian?!
engSearchText: What the hell, Damian?!
jpnChrName: おいダミアン、冗談だよな！？
jpnSearchText: おいダミアン、冗談だよな！？

engChrName: If you forget your question, we're all doomed!
engSearchText: If you forget your question, we're all doomed!
jpnChrName: それを忘れたら、俺たちは全員おしまいだ！
jpnSearchText: それを忘れたら、俺たちは全員おしまいだ！

engChrName: W-Wait a sec. It's on the tip of my tongue...
engSearchText: W-Wait a sec. It's on the tip of my tongue...
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと待て………… あっ……いや……うんん～～……
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、ちょっと待て…………
あっ……いや……うんん～～……

engChrName: Ah! I remember now! The first question was, 'What is the height of the tallest cathedral in the city'?
engSearchText:
Ah! I remember now! The first question was, 'What
is the height of the tallest cathedral in the city'?
jpnChrName: 思い出した！　最初のクイズは 『総大聖堂の最も高い尖塔の高さ』だ！
jpnSearchText:
思い出した！　最初のクイズは
『総大聖堂の最も高い尖塔の高さ』だ！

engChrName: *sigh* You scared me half to death.
engSearchText: *sigh* You scared me half to death.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……びっくりした……
jpnSearchText: ふぅ……びっくりした……

engChrName: The second question was, 'How many films are currently screening at the movie theater'?
engSearchText:
The second question was, 'How many films are
currently screening at the movie theater'?
jpnChrName: あ、第２問は 『映画館で現在上映している映画の数』な。
jpnSearchText:
あ、第２問は
『映画館で現在上映している映画の数』な。

engChrName: The third question was...umm... 'How many years has it been since the opera house was renovated'?
engSearchText:
The third question was...umm... 'How many years has
it been since the opera house was renovated'?
jpnChrName: 第３問は確か…… 『オペラハウスの改修年数』。
jpnSearchText:
第３問は確か……
『オペラハウスの改修年数』。

engChrName: And the last question was, 'What's the number on Oración's one and only red tram?'
engSearchText:
And the last question was, 'What's the number on
Oración's one and only red tram?'
jpnChrName: 最後のクイズは『稀にしか見られない 赤いトラムの管理番号』だそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
最後のクイズは『稀にしか見られない
赤いトラムの管理番号』だそうだ。

engChrName: Oh, and he also mentioned the question order doesn't matter.
engSearchText:
Oh, and he also mentioned the question order
doesn't matter.
jpnChrName: ちなみに『クイズの順番に意味はない』 とも言ってたな……
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに『クイズの順番に意味はない』
とも言ってたな……

engChrName: Got it. I've memorized 'em all.
engSearchText: Got it. I've memorized 'em all.
jpnChrName: ──分かった、覚えておくぜ。
jpnSearchText: ──分かった、覚えておくぜ。

engChrName: I sincerely doubt we'll be able to guess the answers, but we should be able to figure them out without too much trouble.
engSearchText:
I sincerely doubt we'll be able to guess the answers,
but we should be able to figure them out without too
much trouble.
jpnChrName: ふむ……すぐに答えは分からぬが、 それほど難しい問題でもなかろう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……すぐに答えは分からぬが、
それほど難しい問題でもなかろう。

engChrName: Yeah. Those questions don't sound too tough.
engSearchText: Yeah. Those questions don't sound too tough.
jpnChrName: 普通のご当地クイズって感じね。
jpnSearchText: 普通のご当地クイズって感じね。

engChrName: You guys happen to know any of the answers?
engSearchText: You guys happen to know any of the answers?
jpnChrName: この内、答えが分かるのはねえのか？
jpnSearchText: この内、答えが分かるのはねえのか？

engChrName: Surely they teach some of this in school 'round here.
engSearchText: Surely they teach some of this in school 'round here.
jpnChrName: 地元のアンタらなら 知っててもおかしくはねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
地元のアンタらなら
知っててもおかしくはねえだろう。

engChrName: Do you seriously expect us to remember such trivial numbers?
engSearchText:
Do you seriously expect us to remember such
trivial numbers?
jpnChrName: フン、そんなどうでもいい数字なんて 覚えているわけがないだろう！
jpnSearchText:
フン、そんなどうでもいい数字なんて
覚えているわけがないだろう！

engChrName: The only numbers that matter are the ones on our speedometers!
engSearchText:
The only numbers that matter are the ones on
our speedometers!
jpnChrName: 俺たちにとって 意味のある数字は導力車の時速だけだ！
jpnSearchText:
俺たちにとって
意味のある数字は導力車の時速だけだ！

engChrName: Should've known these dumbasses would know nothing.
engSearchText:
Should've known these dumbasses would
know nothing.
jpnChrName: ま、調べりゃすぐ分かるだろ。
jpnSearchText: ま、調べりゃすぐ分かるだろ。

engChrName: We'll just have to go find them ourselves, then.
engSearchText: We'll just have to go find them ourselves, then.
jpnChrName: それぞれのクイズに関連する 場所に行ってみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それぞれのクイズに関連する
場所に行ってみましょうか。

engChrName: Just sit tight until we come back. And don't move a muscle—unless you wanna be blown to kingdom come.
engSearchText:
Just sit tight until we come back. And don't move a
muscle—unless you wanna be blown to
kingdom come.
jpnChrName: アンタらは下手に動くなよ。 ここで大人しく待ってろ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタらは下手に動くなよ。
ここで大人しく待ってろ。

engChrName: Y-You will come back, right?
engSearchText: Y-You will come back, right?
jpnChrName: そ、そんなこと言って、 俺たちを見捨てるつもりはないよな？
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなこと言って、
俺たちを見捨てるつもりはないよな？

engChrName: What kinda heartless monsters do you take us for?
engSearchText: What kinda heartless monsters do you take us for?
jpnChrName: んなつもりはねえから安心しな。
jpnSearchText: んなつもりはねえから安心しな。

engChrName: That said, there's a sliver of a chance we'll forget about you guys.
engSearchText:
That said, there's a sliver of a chance we'll forget
about you guys.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、うっかりアンタらのことを 忘れちまう可能性はないことはねえか。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、うっかりアンタらのことを
忘れちまう可能性はないことはねえか。

engChrName: If that happens, then...uhh...my bad.
engSearchText: If that happens, then...uhh...my bad.
jpnChrName: そうなったら悪ぃ。
jpnSearchText: そうなったら悪ぃ。

engChrName: Please don't forget us!
engSearchText: Please don't forget us!
jpnChrName: ──頼むから忘れないでくれッ！！
jpnSearchText: ──頼むから忘れないでくれッ！！

engChrName: Shall we search the movie theater first? It's close by.
engSearchText: Shall we search the movie theater first? It's close by.
jpnChrName: 手始めに、同じ北街区の映画館を 調べましょうか？
jpnSearchText:
手始めに、同じ北街区の映画館を
調べましょうか？

engChrName: The order doesn't really matter, but yeah, might as well.
engSearchText:
The order doesn't really matter, but yeah, might
as well.
jpnChrName: まあ、順番自体はどうでもいいが……
jpnSearchText: まあ、順番自体はどうでもいいが……

engChrName: We'll have to head to the other two districts for the cathedral and opera house questions.
engSearchText:
We'll have to head to the other two districts for the
cathedral and opera house questions.
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、３つの街区、 全てを調べて回る必要がありそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、３つの街区、
全てを調べて回る必要がありそうだ。

engChrName: We'll save the red tram for last. It's rare as hell, so we may have a wild goose chase in our near future.
engSearchText:
We'll save the red tram for last. It's rare as hell, so we
may have a wild goose chase in our near future.
jpnChrName: そうそう、赤いトラムについては マジでレアだから後回しにすんぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、赤いトラムについては
マジでレアだから後回しにすんぞ。

engChrName: Now that you mention it, I don't think I've ever seen it.
engSearchText:
Now that you mention it, I don't think I've ever
seen it.
jpnChrName: そういえば、 街で見かけたことはありませんね……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、
街で見かけたことはありませんね……

engChrName: Me, neither.
engSearchText: Me, neither.
jpnChrName: とりあえず、 他の３つの場所を回ればいいんですね。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず、
他の３つの場所を回ればいいんですね。

engChrName: We'll worry about it later. Let's go to the other three spots first.
engSearchText:
We'll worry about it later. Let's go to the other three
spots first.
jpnChrName: ああ、とっとと片付けんぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、とっとと片付けんぞ。

engChrName: Y-You're finally back...
engSearchText: Y-You're finally back...
jpnChrName: お、お前たち…… ようやく帰って来たか。
jpnSearchText:
お、お前たち……
ようやく帰って来たか。

engChrName: What a relief...
engSearchText: What a relief...
jpnChrName: 良かった、帰って来てくれて……
jpnSearchText: 良かった、帰って来てくれて……

engChrName: I really thought you left us for dead.
engSearchText: I really thought you left us for dead.
jpnChrName: てっきり捨てられたと思ったぜ……
jpnSearchText: てっきり捨てられたと思ったぜ……

engChrName: I never stopped believing!
engSearchText: I never stopped believing!
jpnChrName: オレは信じてたぜ……！
jpnSearchText: オレは信じてたぜ……！

engChrName: Sorry for taking so long.
engSearchText: Sorry for taking so long.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ずいぶん気を持たせちまったな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ずいぶん気を持たせちまったな。

engChrName: Well, don't keep us in suspense. Did you figure out the answers?
engSearchText:
Well, don't keep us in suspense. Did you figure out
the answers?
jpnChrName: それで、答えは分かったのか。
jpnSearchText: それで、答えは分かったのか。

engChrName: Yes. We have all four.
engSearchText: Yes. We have all four.
jpnChrName: はい、４つとも問題ありません。
jpnSearchText: はい、４つとも問題ありません。

engChrName: Where do we put in the password?
engSearchText: Where do we put in the password?
jpnChrName: で、パスワードの入力は？
jpnSearchText: で、パスワードの入力は？

engChrName: Probably in that device over there.
engSearchText: Probably in that device over there.
jpnChrName: 奥にある、あの装置で行うみたいだね。
jpnSearchText: 奥にある、あの装置で行うみたいだね。

engChrName: I'll handle that—
engSearchText: I'll handle that—
jpnChrName: じゃあ僕が入力を──
jpnSearchText: じゃあ僕が入力を──

engChrName: Wait a sec.
engSearchText: Wait a sec.
jpnChrName: ちょっと待て。
jpnSearchText: ちょっと待て。

engChrName: We know the bombs will go off if we forcibly disarm 'em, but are there other trigger conditions?
engSearchText:
We know the bombs will go off if we forcibly disarm
'em, but are there other trigger conditions?
jpnChrName: おい、爆弾が爆発する条件は 強引に解除しようとした場合以外にもあるよな？
jpnSearchText:
おい、爆弾が爆発する条件は
強引に解除しようとした場合以外にもあるよな？

engChrName: Y-Yeah. They're set to explode at midnight or if you input the wrong password.
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah. They're set to explode at midnight or if you
input the wrong password.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……零時を過ぎた場合と間違った パスワードが入力された時も爆発するそうだ……
jpnSearchText:
あ、ああ……零時を過ぎた場合と間違った
パスワードが入力された時も爆発するそうだ……

engChrName: I'll handle this, then.
engSearchText: I'll handle this, then.
jpnChrName: ……なら入力は俺がやる。
jpnSearchText: ……なら入力は俺がやる。

engChrName: No, it's too dangerous!
engSearchText: No, it's too dangerous!
jpnChrName: でも……そしたらヴァンさんが。
jpnSearchText: でも……そしたらヴァンさんが。

engChrName: There has to be some other way to do this.
engSearchText: There has to be some other way to do this.
jpnChrName: なにか方法はないでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: なにか方法はないでしょうか……

engChrName: FIO will input the password.
engSearchText: FIO will input the password.
jpnChrName: ──ＦＩＯガ入力スル。
jpnSearchText: ──ＦＩＯガ入力スル。

engChrName: But then you'll be in danger!
engSearchText: But then you'll be in danger!
jpnChrName: ですがＦＩＯちゃんが……
jpnSearchText: ですがＦＩＯちゃんが……

engChrName: Fear not. I will be fine.
engSearchText: Fear not. I will be fine.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、心配ナイ。
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫、心配ナイ。

engChrName: Right... We just have to get the password right the first time.
engSearchText:
Right... We just have to get the password right the
first time.
jpnChrName: そうだね…… 僕たちが間違えなければいい話だ。
jpnSearchText:
そうだね……
僕たちが間違えなければいい話だ。

engChrName: Sorry about this, FIO. We're counting on you.
engSearchText: Sorry about this, FIO. We're counting on you.
jpnChrName: すまないＦＩＯ、よろしく頼んだよ。
jpnSearchText: すまないＦＩＯ、よろしく頼んだよ。

engChrName: Roger.
engSearchText: Roger.
jpnChrName: 了解。
jpnSearchText: 了解。

engChrName: The device requires a four-digit password.
engSearchText: The device requires a four-digit password.
jpnChrName: ４桁ノパスワードガ要求サレル。
jpnSearchText: ４桁ノパスワードガ要求サレル。

engChrName: Four digits?!
engSearchText: Four digits?!

engChrName: The hell? I thought we just needed to plug in all the numbers we got.
engSearchText:
The hell? I thought we just needed to plug in all the
numbers we got.
jpnChrName: ４問それぞれの答えを 入力するんじゃねえのかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
４問それぞれの答えを
入力するんじゃねえのかよ！？

engChrName: Seems it won't be that simple.
engSearchText: Seems it won't be that simple.
jpnChrName: どうやらそう簡単には行かぬようだ。
jpnSearchText: どうやらそう簡単には行かぬようだ。

engChrName: Hey, you guys. You remember if the minty maniac said anything else?
engSearchText:
Hey, you guys. You remember if the minty maniac
said anything else?
jpnChrName: おいアンタら、あのミント野郎は 他にも何か言ったか？
jpnSearchText:
おいアンタら、あのミント野郎は
他にも何か言ったか？

engChrName: I'm not sure. I feel like he might have...
engSearchText: I'm not sure. I feel like he might have...
jpnChrName: どうだろう……なんか言ったような………
jpnSearchText: どうだろう……なんか言ったような………

engChrName: Can't say I remember.
engSearchText: Can't say I remember.
jpnChrName: 憶えてねえな。
jpnSearchText: 憶えてねえな。

engChrName: Wait, hold on! Didn't he say something about the numbers needing to be in the same place?
engSearchText:
Wait, hold on! Didn't he say something about the
numbers needing to be in the same place?
jpnChrName: ちょっと待って……！ 確か『同じ位（くらい）の数』とかなんとか……
jpnSearchText:
ちょっと待って……！
確か『同じ位（くらい）の数』とかなんとか……

engChrName: Oh, yeah! That totally slipped my mind.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! That totally slipped my mind.
jpnChrName: ああ、言った言った！ 意味分かんなかったから忘れてた。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、言った言った！
意味分かんなかったから忘れてた。

engChrName: Is that supposed to be some kind of hint?
engSearchText: Is that supposed to be some kind of hint?
jpnChrName: それがクイズの答えとパスワードを 繋ぐヒントってわけね。
jpnSearchText:
それがクイズの答えとパスワードを
繋ぐヒントってわけね。

engChrName: Maybe it has something to do with the arrangement of the numbers?
engSearchText:
Maybe it has something to do with the arrangement
of the numbers?
jpnChrName: 『同じ位（くらい）の数』か…… 配列に関係するものだろうか……
jpnSearchText:
『同じ位（くらい）の数』か……
配列に関係するものだろうか……

engChrName: Perhaps the solution will come to us if we review the answers.
engSearchText:
Perhaps the solution will come to us if we review
the answers.
jpnChrName: オラシオンクイズの答えをおさらいしましょう。
jpnSearchText: オラシオンクイズの答えをおさらいしましょう。

engChrName: The grand cathedral is 184-arge tall.
engSearchText: The grand cathedral is 184-arge tall.
jpnChrName: 総大聖堂の高さは１８４アージュ。
jpnSearchText: 総大聖堂の高さは１８４アージュ。

engChrName: There are eight films being shown at the theater.
engSearchText: There are eight films being shown at the theater.
jpnChrName: 上映中の映画の数は８。
jpnSearchText: 上映中の映画の数は８。

engChrName: It has been ninety-two years since the opera house was renovated.
engSearchText:
It has been ninety-two years since the opera house
was renovated.
jpnChrName: オペラハウスの改修年数は９２年。
jpnSearchText: オペラハウスの改修年数は９２年。

engChrName: And the red tram's number is 3451.
engSearchText: And the red tram's number is 3451.
jpnChrName: 赤いトラムの管理番号は３４５１。
jpnSearchText: 赤いトラムの管理番号は３４５１。

engChrName: Hmm... I think the password is...
engSearchText: Hmm... I think the password is...
jpnChrName: さて、パスワードは──
jpnSearchText: さて、パスワードは──

engChrName: How'd you get that?
engSearchText: How'd you get that?
jpnChrName: どうしてですか？
jpnSearchText: どうしてですか？

engChrName: I'm workin' under the assumption that the password pulls one number from each of the four answers.
engSearchText:
I'm workin' under the assumption that the password
pulls one number from each of the four answers.
jpnChrName: ４つのクイズに全部意味を持たせるなら それぞれの答えから１つの数が──
jpnSearchText:
４つのクイズに全部意味を持たせるなら
それぞれの答えから１つの数が──

engChrName: The tricky part is figuring out which numbers to pick and what order they go in.
engSearchText:
The tricky part is figuring out which numbers to pick
and what order they go in.
jpnChrName: パスワードに繋がると考えるのが自然だ。 問題はどの数だが、そこで『同じ位』がキモになる。
jpnSearchText:
パスワードに繋がると考えるのが自然だ。
問題はどの数だが、そこで『同じ位』がキモになる。

engChrName: But what did he mean by the numbers needing to be in the same place?
engSearchText:
But what did he mean by the numbers needing to be
in the same place?
jpnChrName: それなら４つの答えの同じ位の数でも 成立はするじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
それなら４つの答えの同じ位の数でも
成立はするじゃない？

engChrName: Does he mean the password is the first digit of each answer?
engSearchText:
Does he mean the password is the first digit of
each answer?
jpnChrName: 全部の答えの一の位とかね。
jpnSearchText: 全部の答えの一の位とかね。

engChrName: Don't think so. We'd have no idea what order to put them in.
engSearchText:
Don't think so. We'd have no idea what order to put
them in.
jpnChrName: まあそうなんだが…… それだと結局どういう配列にするかが分からねえ。
jpnSearchText:
まあそうなんだが……
それだと結局どういう配列にするかが分からねえ。

engChrName: Right. If he said the question order mattered, that'd be a different story.
engSearchText:
Right. If he said the question order mattered, that'd
be a different story.
jpnChrName: 確かに……『クイズの順番に意味はない』 とも言われたみたいだし。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……『クイズの順番に意味はない』
とも言われたみたいだし。

engChrName: I think he wants us to take a number from the quiz answers and put them in the same digit space.
engSearchText:
I think he wants us to take a number from the quiz
answers and put them in the same digit space.
jpnChrName: だから『同じ位』はパスワードとクイズの答えが “同じ位の同じ数”を使ってることを意味する。
jpnSearchText:
だから『同じ位』はパスワードとクイズの答えが
“同じ位の同じ数”を使ってることを意味する。

engChrName: If the password borrows a single number from each answer, then this is the only combination that works.
engSearchText:
If the password borrows a single number from each
answer, then this is the only combination that works.
jpnChrName: その上でパスワードがクイズの答えから一つずつ 数を借りてるなら──組み合わせは一通りしかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
その上でパスワードがクイズの答えから一つずつ
数を借りてるなら──組み合わせは一通りしかねぇ。

engChrName: Oh, I see now. Take the three from 3451, the one from 184, the nine from ninety-two, and the eight...
engSearchText:
Oh, I see now. Take the three from 3451, the one
from 184, the nine from ninety-two, and the eight...
jpnChrName: 千の位があるのは３４５１だけ、 そこから３をとってパスワードに嵌める……
jpnSearchText:
千の位があるのは３４５１だけ、
そこから３をとってパスワードに嵌める……

engChrName: ...and you got 3198.
engSearchText: ...and you got 3198.
jpnChrName: 同じ理屈で１８４から１、９２から９、 そして８ってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
同じ理屈で１８４から１、９２から９、
そして８ってわけか。

engChrName: Ah, that makes sense.
engSearchText: Ah, that makes sense.
jpnChrName: なるほど、それで３１９８ですね。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、それで３１９８ですね。

engChrName: It's the only logical answer in this scenario.
engSearchText: It's the only logical answer in this scenario.
jpnChrName: 理に適っている……というより、 これ以上合理的な答えはなさそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
理に適っている……というより、
これ以上合理的な答えはなさそうだ。

engChrName: All right, FIO. Input the password.
engSearchText: All right, FIO. Input the password.
jpnChrName: それじゃＦＩＯ、入力を頼む。
jpnSearchText: それじゃＦＩＯ、入力を頼む。

engChrName: Understood. Inputting 3198.
engSearchText: Understood. Inputting 3198.
jpnSearchText: ３１９８、了解。

engChrName: Let's pull out our shards, you guys. Just in case.
engSearchText: Let's pull out our shards, you guys. Just in case.
jpnChrName: 念のためシャードで防御しとけ！
jpnSearchText: 念のためシャードで防御しとけ！

engChrName: Wh-What the hell?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the hell?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだありゃ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだありゃ！？

engChrName: What about us?
engSearchText: What about us?
jpnChrName: 俺たちは？
jpnSearchText: 俺たちは？

engChrName: Unfortunately, if we get too close, the bombs may detonate automatically.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, if we get too close, the bombs may
detonate automatically.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら中に干渉すると 爆発の恐れがあります。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら中に干渉すると
爆発の恐れがあります。

engChrName: No way...
engSearchText: No way...
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: Input complete.
engSearchText: Input complete.
jpnChrName: 入力完了。
jpnSearchText: 入力完了。

engChrName: Ding, ding, ding! Correctamundo!
engSearchText: Ding, ding, ding! Correctamundo!
jpnChrName: ピンポンピンポ～ン、正解～！
jpnSearchText: <C1>ピンポンピンポ～ン、正解～！

engChrName: I know that voice from anywhere!
engSearchText: I know that voice from anywhere!
jpnChrName: この声は！
jpnSearchText: この声は！

engChrName: Melchior!
engSearchText: Melchior!
jpnChrName: メルキオル！！
jpnSearchText: メルキオル！！

engChrName: This is a recorded message from your friendly neighborhood Melchior! Don't bother responding to anything I say because, well, there'd be no point.
engSearchText:
This is a recorded message from your friendly
neighborhood Melchior! Don't bother responding to
anything I say because, well, there'd be no point.
jpnChrName: あ、ちなみにこの音声は録音だから 質問は受け付けないからね？
jpnSearchText:
あ、ちなみにこの音声は録音だから
質問は受け付けないからね？

engChrName: Anywho, well done!
engSearchText: Anywho, well done!
jpnChrName: とにかく、おめでとう～！
jpnSearchText: <C1>とにかく、おめでとう～！

engChrName: You answered the password correctly, so our resident idiots will live to trespass another day.
engSearchText:
You answered the password correctly, so our resident
idiots will live to trespass another day.
jpnChrName: パスワードは正解だから、 ルシオ君たちはこのまま解放される。
jpnSearchText:
パスワードは正解だから、
ルシオ君たちはこのまま解放される。

engChrName: Whoever you may be—whether you're the guild, fixers, or another party—I want to offer you my sincerest congratulations.
engSearchText:
Whoever you may be—whether you're the guild,
fixers, or another party—I want to offer you my
sincerest congratulations.
jpnChrName: ギルドか、裏解決屋か、それとも他の 誰かがやったのかは知らないけど──
jpnSearchText:
ギルドか、裏解決屋か、それとも他の
誰かがやったのかは知らないけど──

engChrName: You narrowly escaped a most gruesome death at my hands! Give yourselves a round of applause!
engSearchText:
You narrowly escaped a most gruesome death at
my hands! Give yourselves a round of applause!
jpnChrName: ルシオ君たちは生き残ったし良かったね～ パチパチパチッ。
jpnSearchText:
ルシオ君たちは生き残ったし良かったね～
パチパチパチッ。

engChrName: So help me Goddess, I will choke the living HELL out of that annoying little prick.
engSearchText:
So help me Goddess, I will choke the living HELL
out of that annoying little prick.
jpnChrName: 相変わらずイラっと来る野郎だぜ……！
jpnSearchText: 相変わらずイラっと来る野郎だぜ……！

engChrName: Oh, and by the way, I wouldn't have actually killed you if you got the password wrong.
engSearchText:
Oh, and by the way, I wouldn't have actually killed
you if you got the password wrong.
jpnChrName: まぁ、たとえパスワードを間違えたとしても 本当に殺したりはしないけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まぁ、たとえパスワードを間違えたとしても
本当に殺したりはしないけどね。

engChrName: After all, the bombs are all fakes! Fooled you! HAHAHAHAHA!
engSearchText:
After all, the bombs are all fakes! Fooled you!
HAHAHAHAHA!
jpnChrName: 爆弾は全部偽物、粋なジョークってわけさ。 楽しんでもらえたかな？
jpnSearchText:
爆弾は全部偽物、粋なジョークってわけさ。
楽しんでもらえたかな？

engChrName: Wh-What the...?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the...?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだと！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだと！？

engChrName: That piece of SHIT! I'm gonna kill that bastard!
engSearchText: That piece of SHIT! I'm gonna kill that bastard!
jpnChrName: あのナヨメン野郎、舐めやがって！！
jpnSearchText: あのナヨメン野郎、舐めやがって！！

engChrName: Roger.
engSearchText: Roger.
jpnChrName: 了解。
jpnSearchText: 了解。

engChrName: Let's pull out our shards, you guys. Just in case.
engSearchText: Let's pull out our shards, you guys. Just in case.
jpnChrName: 念のためシャードで防御しとけ！
jpnSearchText: 念のためシャードで防御しとけ！

engChrName: Wh-What the hell?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the hell?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだありゃ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだありゃ！？

engChrName: What about us?
engSearchText: What about us?
jpnChrName: 俺たちは？
jpnSearchText: 俺たちは？

engChrName: Unfortunately, if we get too close, the bombs may detonate automatically.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, if we get too close, the bombs may
detonate automatically.
jpnChrName: 残念ながら中に干渉すると 爆発の恐れがあります。
jpnSearchText:
残念ながら中に干渉すると
爆発の恐れがあります。

engChrName: No way...
engSearchText: No way...
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: Input complete.
engSearchText: Input complete.
jpnChrName: 入力完了。
jpnSearchText: 入力完了。

engChrName: BZZZT! Wrongamundo.
engSearchText: BZZZT! Wrongamundo.
jpnChrName: バ～ン──！！　不正解～。

engChrName: I know that voice from anywhere. It's Melchior!
engSearchText: I know that voice from anywhere. It's Melchior!
jpnChrName: この声、メルキオルの野郎！
jpnSearchText: この声、メルキオルの野郎！

engChrName: Oh, no. We got it wrong...
engSearchText: Oh, no. We got it wrong...
jpnChrName: それより──
jpnSearchText: それより──

engChrName: Unfortunately, it's game over for you. But at least you're going out...WITH A BANG!
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it's game over for you. But at least
you're going out...WITH A BANG!
jpnChrName: 残念ながらパスワードが違ったため これからみんな仲良く肉片になりま～す！
jpnSearchText:
残念ながらパスワードが違ったため
これからみんな仲良く肉片になりま～す！

engChrName: ...Got'cha! ♪
engSearchText: ...Got'cha! ♪
jpnChrName: なんてね♪　冗談だよ冗談。
jpnSearchText: <C1>なんてね♪　冗談だよ冗談。

engChrName: ...What?
engSearchText: ...What?
jpnChrName: ……はぁ？
jpnSearchText: ……はぁ？

engChrName: Surprise! The bombs are all fake! Fooled you!
engSearchText: Surprise! The bombs are all fake! Fooled you!
jpnChrName: いきなりそんなことするわけないじゃん、 粋なジョークってヤツさ。
jpnSearchText:
いきなりそんなことするわけないじゃん、
粋なジョークってヤツさ。

engChrName: HAHAHAHAHA! Oh, I wish I was there to see the looks on your faces!
engSearchText:
HAHAHAHAHA! Oh, I wish I was there to see the
looks on your faces!
jpnChrName: 楽しんでもらえたかな？
jpnSearchText: <C1>楽しんでもらえたかな？

engChrName: That freaking asshole played us!
engSearchText: That freaking asshole played us!
jpnChrName: クソ、舐めた真似しやがって！
jpnSearchText: クソ、舐めた真似しやがって！

engChrName: By the way, this is only a recorded message, so if you're yelling at me—and I'm sure you are—you're quite literally wasting your breath!
engSearchText:
By the way, this is only a recorded message, so if
you're yelling at me—and I'm sure you are—you're
quite literally wasting your breath!
jpnChrName: ちなみにこの音声は録音で、 文句は受け付けないからね？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにこの音声は録音で、
文句は受け付けないからね？

engChrName: Grr... I wanna mess that guy up!
engSearchText: Grr... I wanna mess that guy up!
jpnChrName: あのナヨメン野郎……！！
jpnSearchText: あのナヨメン野郎……！！

engChrName: Hopefully this experience has taught you a valuable lesson: never trespass on other people's gardens.
engSearchText:
Hopefully this experience has taught you a valuable
lesson: never trespass on other people's gardens.
jpnChrName: これに懲りたら もう勝手に人の庭に入らないでね。
jpnSearchText:
これに懲りたら
もう勝手に人の庭に入らないでね。

engChrName: Oh, but if you're feeling a little daring, then by all means! Just know that next time, I won't show you any mercy! ❤
engSearchText:
Oh, but if you're feeling a little daring, then by
all means! Just know that next time, I won't show you
any mercy! ❤
jpnChrName: いや、また僕と遊びたいなら来てもいいかな？ 今度こそ、生きて帰れる保証はないけどね❤
jpnSearchText:
いや、また僕と遊びたいなら来てもいいかな？
今度こそ、生きて帰れる保証はないけどね❤

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnChrName: ひぃぃ～～！
jpnSearchText: ひぃぃ～～！

engChrName: See you later!
engSearchText: See you later!
jpnChrName: じゃあね、また今度～。
jpnSearchText: <C1>じゃあね、また今度～。

engChrName: I am SO done with this! I'm never coming back to this place!
engSearchText:
I am SO done with this! I'm never coming back to
this place!
jpnChrName: 言われなくてもこんなことはもう懲り懲りだ！ もう二度と来るもんか！
jpnSearchText:
言われなくてもこんなことはもう懲り懲りだ！
もう二度と来るもんか！

engChrName: I can't believe the bombs were fakes this whole time.
engSearchText: I can't believe the bombs were fakes this whole time.
jpnChrName: ったくびっくりしたぜ、 あの爆弾は全部偽物かよ。
jpnSearchText:
ったくびっくりしたぜ、
あの爆弾は全部偽物かよ。

engChrName: Hmph. I should've known that no one was crazy enough to murder us with bombs—especially over such a minor offense.
engSearchText:
Hmph. I should've known that no one was crazy
enough to murder us with bombs—especially over
such a minor offense.
jpnChrName: ふん、さすがにこのくらいのことで 爆弾で人を殺すような狂ったヤツはいないか。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、さすがにこのくらいのことで
爆弾で人を殺すような狂ったヤツはいないか。

engChrName: ...Did you learn nothing from this?
engSearchText: ...Did you learn nothing from this?
jpnChrName: え？　なにその反応？
jpnSearchText: え？　なにその反応？

engChrName: *sigh* Let's just get you back to the surface. There are still monsters roaming around.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Let's just get you back to the surface. There are
still monsters roaming around.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ、この辺りは魔獣も出ますし 早く地上に戻りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ、この辺りは魔獣も出ますし
早く地上に戻りましょう。
